General.Name: Fujian SuperTech Advanced Material Co Ltd
General.Description: Fujian Supertch Advanced Material CO.,Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of vacuum insulation panels (VIP), VIP-based vacuum insulated boxes, and barrier film in China. It serves refrigerators, pharmaceutical cold chain, cold chain transportation, building insulation materials, vacuum consumer goods, and food preservation markets. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Longyan, China.

5.Name: Mr. Bihui  Zhang
5.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
